title: Login
name: GetJWTToken
description: This API gets Auth token from Orion Connect and returns JWT token.

title: Get Authorized User
name: GetUser
description: This API gets user id from Orion Connect application and fetch respective user details from Eclipse.

Success 200.description: User exist or not into the system.
Id of user who created the User into the syatem.
Id of user who edited the User details into the syatem.

title: Logout
name: Logout
description: This API invalidates token and logouts user from application.

Success 200.description: Custodian exist or not into the system.
Id of user who created the Custodian into the system.
Id of user who edited the Custodian details into the system.
Trade execution type for all security type.
Custodian exist or not into the system.
Id of user who created the Custodian into the system.
Id of user who edited the Custodian details into the system.
Number of new users in last day.
Number of new roles in last day.

title: Get Preference Levels
name: ListAllPreferenceLevels
description: This API will provide list of preferences levels.

examples.title: Response (example):

title: List Preferences By Level
name: ListPreferencesByLevel
description: This API will provide list of preferences for provided Level's bit value (:levelid) and Level's record id (:recordid) e.g levelId 2 Custodian and then recordId will be selected custodian's unique id

Success 200.description: bitValue of record for which we need preferences.
List of preferences mapped by selected Level's bit value and level's record id.

examples.title: Response (example):
Response (example):

title: Get List Of Records By RecordType
name: ListRecordsByLevelType
description: This API will provide records of select level if exist mapped by provided LevelType's bitvalue (levelbitvalue).

Success 200.description: Unique id of level's record from db.

examples.title: Response (example):

title: Get Preference Level By Id
name: PreferenceLevelById
description: This API will provide single level object mapped by provided id.

examples.title: Response (example):

title: Update Prefereces
name: UpdatePrefereces
description: This API used to save or update preferences value for specific record Type.

Parameter.description: bitValue of Record for which preferences are going to update.
List of preferences to save or update.
